thread.title: Cloud boom boosts Google Amazon profit

title: Cloud boom boosts Google Amazon profit
text:
Cloud boom boosts Google, Amazon profit 
The Daily Star Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Amazon.com, Google and Microsoft all topped profit estimates last quarter, highlighting the widening gulf between companies that deliver computing via server-laden warehouses and a generation of latecomers to the cloud boom.These data centers are capable of providing a broad range of services at low cost - be it Microsoft's personal and business software, Amazon's e-commerce and computing power, or Google's Web search and advertising algorithms.Google, Microsoft and Amazon get added revenue as they become sellers of computing power to a growing number of other companies on the hunt for low-cos...
